title: Who Are Ambassadors?
paragraph1: The coding ambassadors are representatives of Coders(hq) hand-picked from the Coders(hq) community to facilitate community interactions. The initiative will also help more than 2500 coders to benefit from the program. Ambassadors will have many exciting opportunities to enhance their skills in coding, public speaking, and leading projects. Along with other benefits, ambassadors who achieve exceptional performance will have their efforts showcased on multiple CHQ channels.
paragraph2: The ambassadors will be leading the development of three open source projects. Each of which will be integral in the CHQ roadmap. As well as auxiliary projects, events and workshops.
